name: Chris Bailey
description: '''Christopher Mark Bailey''' (31 May 1950{{spaced ndash}}4 April 2013) was an Australian [[bass guitar]]ist and vocalist. He was a member of various rock groups including [[Headband (band)|Headband]] (1971–1974), [[The Angels (Australian band)|The Angels]] (1976–1982, 2008–2013), [[GANGgajang]] (1984–2013), and [[The Stetsons]] (1987, 1997). Bailey died of [[Head and neck cancer|throat cancer]], aged 62.
